title: LinkedInClient Replacement
description: Replace LinkedInClient.swift internals with TinyFishClient delegation while maintaining the same public API. CLI and MCP layers need minimal changes.

title: LinkedInClient Facade Rewrite
description: Rewrite LinkedInClient.swift to wrap TinyFishClient internally, keeping same public method signatures. Accept TinyFish API key (primary) + optional li_at. All methods delegate to TinyFishClient. Map response format differences. Deprecate Voyager-specific methods. Update LinkedInKit.swift createClient() factory. This is the integration glue — must not break CLI or MCP.
close_reason: LinkedInClient rewritten as thin TinyFishClient facade, removing 1000+ lines of Voyager API code

title: MCP Server Updates
description: Update LinkedInMCP.swift to expose all new TinyFish-powered capabilities as MCP tools for AI assistants.

title: MCP Tool Updates
description: Update LinkedInMCP.swift. Update existing tools (linkedin_get_profile, linkedin_get_company, linkedin_search_jobs) for TinyFish backend. Add new tools: linkedin_send_message, linkedin_send_connection_request, linkedin_create_post. Detailed tool descriptions for LLM understanding. Proper error handling. Read API key from env or CredentialStore. Test with Claude Desktop.

title: Dependency Cleanup
description: Remove SwiftSoup, PeekabooClient, GeminiVision and other dead code after TinyFish migration.

title: Remove SwiftSoup Dependency
description: Delete ProfileParser.swift and JobParser.swift (HTML parsing no longer needed). Remove SwiftSoup from Package.swift dependencies and LinkLion target. Verify build succeeds. Remove any remaining SwiftSoup imports. Reduces binary size and build time significantly.
close_reason: SwiftSoup dependency removed from Package.swift and dead code files (ProfileParser, JobParser, GeminiVision, PeekabooClient) deleted after facade rewrite confirmed clean. VisionElement type rescued into Models.swift for test compatibility. Build verified clean.

title: Remove Dead Code
description: Delete PeekabooClient.swift (browser automation via Peekaboo — replaced by TinyFish). Delete GeminiVision.swift (screenshot-to-data — replaced). Remove Voyager API URL constants/endpoints. Clean unused imports. swift build to verify. Keep SweetCookieKit (still useful for cookie extraction). Keep Models.swift (data models still used).
close_reason: SwiftSoup dependency removed from Package.swift and dead code files (ProfileParser, JobParser, GeminiVision, PeekabooClient) deleted after facade rewrite confirmed clean. VisionElement type rescued into Models.swift for test compatibility. Build verified clean.

title: TinyFish Core Client
description: Create TinyFishClient.swift actor — SSE parsing, AgentQL wrapper, remote browser sessions. Foundation for all LinkedIn operations.

title: SSE Stream Parser
description: Create SSEParser.swift in Sources/LinkLion/. Parse Server-Sent Events from TinyFish run-sse endpoint using URLSession.bytes(for:). Emit events via AsyncThrowingStream<SSEEvent, Error>. Handle event/data/id fields, multi-line data, reconnection, timeouts, cancellation. Event types: progress (intermediate), result (final JSON), error. Must be Sendable for actor context. Include fixtures for testing.

title: AgentQL Query Wrapper
description: Create AgentQLClient.swift wrapping POST https://api.agentql.com/v1/query-data. Accept URL + AgentQL query string + optional params (browser_profile, proxy). Return decoded JSON via generic Codable. Handle rate limits, auth failures, query syntax errors. Add retry with exponential backoff. Same API key as TinyFish.

title: Remote Browser Session Manager
description: Create RemoteBrowserSession.swift. POST https://api.agentql.com/v1/tetra/sessions to get CDP URL. Inject li_at cookie via CDP for LinkedIn auth. Manage lifecycle: create, keep-alive, destroy. Handle session timeouts and reconnection. li_at from CredentialStore.swift (existing). Consider connection pooling for concurrent ops.

title: TinyFishClient Actor Assembly
description: Create TinyFishClient.swift as Swift actor composing SSEParser + AgentQLClient + RemoteBrowserSession. Init with API key + optional li_at. Methods: runAgent(url:goal:), queryData(url:query:), withAuthSession(). Route public data via AgentQL, authenticated via remote browser. Centralized error handling, swift-log logging, retry logic, rate limit awareness. Protocol-based HTTP for testability. Consider response caching.
close_reason: TinyFishClient hardened with retry logic, protocol HTTP, and rate limiting

title: Testing
description: Unit tests (mocked TinyFish responses) and E2E tests (real API calls) for all features.

title: Unit Tests - SSE Parser
description: Unit tests for SSEParser: well-formed events, multi-line data, event boundaries, partial data, error events, cancellation. Use mock data streams (no HTTP). Create fixture files with sample TinyFish SSE streams.

title: Unit Tests - TinyFishClient
description: Unit tests with mocked HTTP: profile fetch → PersonProfile mapping, company → CompanyProfile, job search → [JobListing], error handling (API errors, network failures, malformed JSON), rate limiting, API key validation. Protocol-based HTTP abstraction → inject mock URLSession.

title: E2E Tests - Profile & Company
description: E2E tests with real TinyFish API: fetch known public profile (satya-nadella), known company (microsoft), verify key fields present. Test non-existent profile/company. Measure response time and step count. Skip in CI if no API key. Assert field presence/types, not exact values (titles change).

title: E2E Tests - Authenticated Operations
description: E2E tests for auth ops: remote browser session creation, cookie injection, connection request flow, messaging, post creation (create + delete). Requires API key + li_at. Use test LinkedIn accounts. Expensive tests (many steps) — manual only, not CI. Mark @Test(.disabled) by default.

title: Demo & Application
description: Demo video, X post, and accelerator application. Time-sensitive — TinyFish accelerator started Feb 17, 2026.

title: Record Demo Video
description: Record 2-3 min demo: Hook (15s) 'LinkedIn has 1B users and no real API', CLI demo (45s) auth+profile+jobs, MCP demo (45s) Claude Desktop using tools, Outreach (30s) connect+message, Scale pitch (15s) '1000 profiles parallel, $0.04/op', CTA (10s). Clean terminal, good font, pre-test commands, asciinema + voiceover, 1080p+.

title: Draft X Post for TinyFish
description: Draft X post announcing LinkedFish, tag @taborai @AgentQL. Hook about LinkedIn API gap, what LinkedFish does (CLI+MCP), how TinyFish powers it. Link demo video. Under 280 chars main tweet, thread for details. Include GIF/screenshot. Post during US business hours.

title: Draft Accelerator Application Email
description: Draft email to TinyFish for accelerator: who you are (technical founder, Swift dev), what LinkedFish is, why TinyFish (eliminated Voyager reverse-engineering), market potential (Phantombuster $10M+ ARR comp), what you'd do with accelerator. Attach demo link. Mention Feb 17 cohort start — show urgency. B2B positioning aligns with their focus. Research correct contact email.

title: CLI Command Updates
description: Update ArgumentParser CLI commands for TinyFish backend. Auth flow changes, new commands for messaging/connections/posting.

title: Auth Command Update
description: Update 'linkedin auth' in LinkedIn.swift. Add --api-key option for TinyFish key. Store in CredentialStore (Keychain). Keep --cookie/browser extraction as secondary auth. Add 'auth status' (API key set? Cookie set? Expiry?) and 'auth clear'. Update help text for two-tier auth model. Validate API key format before storing.
close_reason: Auth CLI updated with --api-key option and Status command shows TinyFish status

title: Profile Command Update
description: Update 'linkedin profile <username>'. Read API key from CredentialStore, route through updated LinkedInClient. Keep identical output format. Add --raw flag (raw TinyFish JSON) and --format json|text|table. Handle SSE streaming gracefully (progress while fetching). User-friendly error messages.

title: Company Command Update
description: Update 'linkedin company <name>'. Route through updated LinkedInClient. Add --raw and --format flags. Handle company-not-found gracefully.

title: Jobs Command Update
description: Update 'linkedin jobs <query> [--location]'. Route through updated LinkedInClient. Add --page/--limit pagination. Add --details <job-id> for individual jobs. Add output format options.

title: Connect Command (New)
description: New CLI command: 'linkedin connect <username> [--note "msg"]'. Requires li_at cookie. Show progress during TinyFish agent execution. Confirm success/failure. Add --dry-run. Warn if no cookie set. Show weekly connection limit if available.

title: Message Command (New)
description: New CLI command: 'linkedin message <username> "text"'. Requires auth. Show progress, confirm delivery. Add --thread for replies. Handle not-connected errors with helpful message.

title: Post Command (New)
description: New CLI command: 'linkedin post "content"' or 'linkedin post --file post.md'. Requires auth. Show progress. Add --draft (stretch). 3000 char validation.

title: LinkedIn Method Implementations
description: Implement LinkedIn-specific methods (profile, company, jobs, connect, message, post) on TinyFishClient. Each method crafts the right TinyFish goal/AgentQL query and maps responses to existing Swift models.

title: Profile Fetching via TinyFish
description: Add getProfile(username:) -> PersonProfile to TinyFishClient. URL: linkedin.com/in/{username}. Public profiles: AgentQL query for name/headline/location/about/experiences/education/skills/connections. Full profiles: authenticated remote session. Map JSON to existing PersonProfile model. Handle private profiles, 'LinkedIn member' placeholders, not found. Robust mapping with defaults for missing fields.

title: Company Info Fetching
description: Add getCompany(name:) -> CompanyProfile. URL: linkedin.com/company/{name}. AgentQL query for name/description/website/industry/size/HQ/founded/specialties/followers. Map to existing CompanyProfile. Handle: not found, redirects, slug differences. No auth needed — company pages are public.

title: Job Search Implementation
description: Add searchJobs(query:location:filters:) -> [JobListing]. TinyFish goal navigates LinkedIn job search, extracts all visible listings. Map to existing JobListing model. Support pagination. Add getJobDetails(jobId:) -> JobDetails. Optimize: extract max data per page to minimize steps (~$0.015/step). Filters: remote, experience level, date posted map to URL params.

title: Send Connection Request
description: Add sendConnectionRequest(to:note:). Authenticated remote browser session. Navigate to profile, click Connect, enter optional note (300 char limit), click Send. Handle: already connected, pending request, weekly limit (~100/week), profile not found, Connect behind 'More' menu, 'How do you know' dialog, Follow-only profiles.

title: Send Message
description: Add sendMessage(to:message:). Authenticated session. Navigate to messaging, compose and send. Verify delivery. Handle: not connected (can't message without InMail), message too long, user not found. Support follow-ups in existing threads. Beware LinkedIn rate limits on rapid automated messages.

title: Create Post
description: Add createPost(content:). Authenticated session. Navigate to feed, click 'Start a post', enter content, click Post. Verify published. 3000 char limit. Handle: content too long, post failed. Stretch: image/media attachments, hashtag support, draft saving.

close_reason: LinkedInClient rewired to delegate to TinyFishClient when API key present
All 12 MCP tools implemented including send_invite, send_message, create_post
All MCP tools updated for TinyFish backend + new tools added
TinyFishClient.swift (576 lines) fully implemented
SSE stream parser implemented with parseSSEStream in TinyFishClient.swift
AgentQL queryData and queryWithPrompt implemented in TinyFishClient.swift
BrowserSession, createAuthenticatedSession, closeSession all implemented
102 unit tests passing including parser tests
All 12 CLI subcommands implemented (auth, profile, company, jobs, job, post, connect, send, inbox, messages)
Profile CLI command implemented in LinkedIn.swift
Company CLI command implemented in LinkedIn.swift
Jobs + Job CLI commands implemented in LinkedIn.swift
Connect CLI command implemented in LinkedIn.swift
Send (Message) CLI command implemented in LinkedIn.swift
Post CLI command implemented in LinkedIn.swift
TinyFishLinkedIn.swift (516 lines) with all LinkedIn methods
getLinkedInProfile implemented in TinyFishLinkedIn.swift
getLinkedInCompany implemented in TinyFishLinkedIn.swift
searchLinkedInJobs implemented in TinyFishLinkedIn.swift
sendLinkedInConnectionRequest implemented in TinyFishLinkedIn.swift
sendLinkedInMessage implemented in TinyFishLinkedIn.swift
createLinkedInPost implemented in TinyFishLinkedIn.swift
